bill.summary:
This resolution supports the designation, and the goals and ideals, of National Bladder Cancer Awareness Month.
It also calls on the people of the United States, interested groups, and affected persons to (1) promote awareness of bladder cancer and to foster understanding of the impact of the disease on patients and their families and caregivers, and (2) take an active role in the fight to end bladder cancer.
